Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Anna Magid Papers TAM 435
0.5 Linear Feet (1 box)
circa 1930-1955 Collection of documents and photographs related to Anna Magid, a member and tenant of the Workers Colony Corporation in the Bronx. 1
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Materials found in collection; provenance is unknown. The accession number associated with this gift is 2008.059.
Historical/Biographical Note
Anna Magid was a member and tenant of the United Workers Colony Corporation in the Bronx.
Scope and Contents
This small collection of documents includes tenant's stock certificate and a Yiddish middle school graduation book.
Conditions Governing Use
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in circa 1930-1955, are expected to enter the public domain in 2075.
